db:abstract.db:para: The Places List example demonstrates how to search for and display a list of places using a ListView.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TARGET = places_list TEMPLATE = app
QT += quick qml network positioning location SOURCES = main.cpp
RESOURCES += \ places_list.qrc
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/location/places_list INSTALLS += target
